title: Veterans Leading in Agriculture & Entrepreneurship [Sustainable Farming]

tasks.task: Feed chickens and manage the chicken pen area.
subtasks: Allow chickens access to extra raw milk.
Greet and let chickens out of the pen.
Clean and inspect the roosting bars.
Maintain egg boxes and check for eggs.
Install additional egg boxes as needed.

tasks.task: Operate the farm and promote regenerative agriculture.
subtasks: Conduct a virtual tour of the farm.
Explain the benefits of pasture-raised eggs.
Share personal background and motivation for farming.
Discuss the impact of farming on mental health.
Advocate for small-scale, regenerative farming practices.
Encourage other farmers to join in the movement.
Provide advice for veterans starting a business.
